text: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُوا۟ وَٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: And do not be like the ones who became divided and differed after the clear proofs had come to them. And those will have a great punishment.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan janganlah kamu menyerupai orang-orang yang bercerai-berai dan berselisih sesudah datang keterangan yang jelas kepada mereka. Mereka itulah orang-orang yang mendapat siksa yang berat,
